Parameters.Name: DEVICE-4-1-5 SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE

Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return correct response.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-4-1-5 SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE
STEP 1 - Create users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Delete Users - negative test Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Sender Subcode: InvalidArgVal Subcode: UsernameMissing Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.DeleteUsers(String[] Username) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 473 STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check if the DUT returned users list STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that the user OnvifTest1 has not been deleted STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Delete users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Check if the DUT returned users list STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check that the user OnvifTest1 has been deleted STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: Fault on CreateUsers (TooManyUsers)
Test.Description: Check SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return Fault on CreateUsers (TooManyUsers).

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-4-1-5 SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE
STEP 1 - Create users Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: Action Subcode: TooManyUsers Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.CreateUsers(User[] User) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 461 Maximum number of supported users exceeded. STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

DEVICE-4-1-5 SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE

Test.Name: No response on CreateUsers
Test.Description: Check SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return no response on CreateUsers.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-4-1-5 SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE
STEP 1 - Create users Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Wrong fault on first DeleteUsers
Test.Description: Check SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return Fault on first DeleteUsers.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-4-1-5 SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE
STEP 1 - Create users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Delete Users - negative test Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Sender Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.DeleteUsers(String[] Username) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 473 The SOAP FAULT returned from the DUT is invalid: fault subcodes sequence is incorrect. Expected: env:Sender/ter:InvalidArgVal/ter:UsernameMissing, actual: env:Sender STEP FAILED
Starting rollback procedure
STEP 3 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check if the DUT returned users list STEP PASSED
No user accounts to delete TEST FAILED

Test.Name: No response on first DeleteUsers
Test.Description: Check SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return no response on first DeleteUsers.

DEVICE-4-1-5 SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS ERROR CASE
